system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision item list. GTK+ implementation." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2012-05-02 22:50:26 -0700 (Wed, 02 May 2012) $" revision: "$Revision: 88680 $"
deferred class ../implementation_gtk/ev_item_list_imp.xmlEV_ITEM_LIST_IMP [reference G -> ../interface/ev_item.xmlEV_ITEM]
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_item_list_i.xmlEV_ITEM_LIST_I [G] redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_item_list_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_gtk/ev_dynamic_list_imp.xmlEV_DYNAMIC_LIST_IMP [G] redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_item_list_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
FalseDISPOSABLE
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_item_list_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_item_list.xmlEV_ITEM_LIST [G] note option: stable attribute end
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2012, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 5949 Hollister Ave., Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../implementation_gtk/ev_item_list_imp.xmlEV_ITEM_LIST_IMP
